charas.name: Obi-Wan Kenobi
charas.quote: Don't try it! I have the higher ground!

charas.name: Palpatine / Darth Sidious
charas.quote: Good, good, let the hate flow through you.

charas.name: Mace Windu
charas.quote: Your are on this council but we do not grant you the rank of Master.

charas.name: Luke Skywalker
charas.quote: I am a Jedi like my father before me.

charas.name: Leia Organa
charas.quote: Aren't you a little short for a stormtrooper?

charas.name: Qui-Gon Jinn
charas.quote: The ability to speak does not make you intelligent.

charas.name: Darth Maul
charas.quote: At last we will have revenge.
